title: Yet another issue with yet another update
body:
Why is it that, your game d/cs me, crashes the client so I can't reconnect, reopen the game for it to tell me I need to update, wait for the update, then not even let me log in after it's done?

I have had to uninstall and reinstall this game 5 times this week. AND THIS IS A NEW PC  only league is on it right now

replies.body:
Hmmmmm this sounds like your client is having some hefty problems trying to get a solid connection with our servers. When you d/c'd back to the client and it was trying to update, that was most likely due to some corrupted files the client was trying to fix. After that, the files may not have been completed fixed if that connection was interrupted again. 

Let's try to hit both of these issues at once with a few different steps. First, let's make sure your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are all setup in the best way for League to access our game servers. Then, grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a quick **force repatch**.
I'm good, that tool doesnt fix anything
